name: filestash
description: Filestash connects to cloud or FTP servers and exposes them through a user-friendly web UI. It supports WebDAV, S3, Git, Dropbox, and others with a single centralized UX. Aimed at developers and teams that need unified access.
features: Universal Access: Connect to S3, FTP, WebDAV, Git, Dropbox, Unified web UI. One interface for all storage.
Multi-Protocol: Support for many backends. Maximum flexibility.
Developer-Friendly: API access and integrations. Built for teams.
Centralized UX: Single interface for everything. Simplified workflows.
File Previews: View documents, images, videos. Rich media support.
Text Editor: Edit files directly. Built-in functionality.
Plugin System: Extend with custom backends. Highly extensible.
Authentication: LDAP, OAuth, and more. Enterprise-ready.
Mobile-Optimized: Works on all devices. Responsive design.
